mapper.insert: INSERT INTO letters (receive_user_no, send_user_no, item_no, letter_content, letter_title, letter_reg_datetime, letter_check) VALUES (#{receive_user_no}, #{send_user_no}, #{item_no}, #{letter_content},#{letter_title}, #{letter_reg_datetime}, #{letter_check})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM letters WHERE receive_user_no=#{receive_user_no} ORDER BY letter_no DESC
